Package com.ae2dms.Controllers

Class SettingController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.Controllers.SettingController
public class SettingController
extends java.lang.Object

The Class SettingController is the controller class of setting.fxml. Initialize the setting scene, define some mouse event, use to control the soundEffect in the game and crates colors.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
Author:
Yixin SHEN
date
2020/11/25-13:34

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int Color
    Defines the crates color in the game, 0 to BLUE, 1 to GREEN, 2 to RED.
    javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> ColorBox
    fxml element, a comboBox for choosing crates color in the game.
    javafx.scene.image.ImageView ImgOff
    fxml element, volume off img.
    javafx.scene.image.ImageView ImgOn
    fxml element, volume on img.
    javafx.scene.control.Button Return
    fxml element, Return to menu button.
    javafx.scene.control.CheckBox SoundControl
    fxml element, soundEffect check box.
    static boolean soundEffect
    Defines whether the sound effect is on or off.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize the setting scene.

      set ImgOn and ImgOff visible or not according to soundEffect. Set the color box options, set the initial value for the box according to Color value.

      date
      2020/11/29-17:18

    • ReturnMenu

      public void ReturnMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Return to the menu scene.

      Click the button, play the interface sound and return to the menu scene.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/29-17:21

    • SoundControl

      public void SoundControl​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Control the soundEffect value, set the value to opposite value.

      Set the soundEffect value to its oppsite value, play the interface sound and set the visivle value to the ImgOn and ImgOff.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click.
      date
      2020/11/29-17:23

    • SetColor

      public void SetColor​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Set the Color value.

      Play the interface sound and set the Color value according to what color player chosen.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click.
      date
      2020/11/29-17:26
